channel.title: Team-Chrome 24/7 online!
channel.description:
Hello and welcome to Team-Chrome!!
Team-Chrome is small community server made for ppl who played runescape between 2006 and 2007.
xp rate is x28 so u get 112xp per hit :)
- Fun and Fast Combat
- 24/7 Online (but not vps hosted) :(
- Minigames eg. (Pest Control, Castlewars...)
- Really active, Friendly Staff, alot of drop parties.
- Fight pits, duel arena even tutorial island (pretty bugged, but getting fixed as soon as possible) ,,
- Working skills! (no hunter, construction)
Combat
*All the normal features *Some degradable equipment *Weapon Poisoning
Magic
*Ancients and Normals *Working Multi Barrage *Correct hits and anims
Ranged
*Working throwing knifes *Normal Bows and Arrows ALSO DWARF MUTLICANNON!
Prayer
*Burying *Working Altars *All prayers work *Draining at JAD
Mining *Emptying Rocks
Woodcutting
Tree stumps Examine / Prospect
All the other skills are added ingame, more will be added to list.
Quests
Free: *Dwarf Cannon (working cannons too) *Horror from the deep *Lost City *Romeo & Juliet *Rune Mysteries (old version) *The Mage's Challenge *Dragon Slayer *Cook's assistant *Witch's Potion *Gertrude's Cat *Champions' Challenge
Music and sounds
*Working Sounds *Music in areas
Random Events
*Genie *Tree Spirit *Old man *Rock Golem *Tree turning in monster tree
- Minigames <3
- Duel Arena - Castle Wars - Fight Caves - Barrows - Pest Control - Tzhaar Caves
- Miscellaneous
- Working Clue Scrolls - A lot of working trapdoors - Working Boats - Working Tutorial Island - Weapon poisoning - Loads more!
- We need staff! First 1 on gets mod and after 10 players on we are doing drop party!
- staff team
Mod Mezzy, Owner
NatBradz, my co-owner <3
MODERATORS
-
SCREENSHOTS:
http://gyazo.com/b401a405e01eee33073a56cfa73d162c
http://gyazo.com/6132696fab0c8beecfcd30aae1e3d762
http://gyazo.com/5c04e39227f18894d1cd559449e1877d
http://gyazo.com/59434921a01c1e82d599ce101671add1
http://gyazo.com/148807d5d86d00ac2fe72613f7d0fa12
http://gyazo.com/b6a9d888478c5cd40e3f11d83a36d30f
!!!CLIENT DOWNLOAD LINK: http://www.mediafire.com/?k5j4s5ujpim02fb
!!!CACHE DOWNLOAD LINK: http://www.mediafire.com/?75eec98orqs31k5
Right after you have downloaded cache, rename it to ("espkc_32") then open your (c:) disk > and windows.. put it right there then extract your client and find run.cmd right click it and change the java jdk to your own one. or then just download java jdk 1.7.0_40 from google :) if u cant get ur client working comment down below or pm me at skype "baws.legacy" im pretty often online so ima help u so fast i can!

item.title: Team-Chrome 24/7 online!
item.dc:creator: @Team-Chrome Team-Chrome
item.description:
@Team-Chrome wrote:

Hello and welcome to Team-Chrome!!

Team-Chrome is small community server made for ppl who played runescape between 2006 and 2007.

xp rate is x28 so u get 112xp per hit

  • Fun and Fast Combat

  • 24/7 Online (but not vps hosted)

  • Minigames eg. (Pest Control, Castlewars…)

  • Really active, Friendly Staff, alot of drop parties.

  • Fight pits, duel arena even tutorial island (pretty bugged,
    but getting fixed as soon as possible) ,

  • Working skills! (no hunter, construction)

Combat

*All the normal features
*Some degradable equipment
*Weapon Poisoning

Magic

*Ancients and Normals
*Working Multi Barrage
*Correct hits and anims

Ranged

*Working throwing knifes
*Normal Bows and Arrows
ALSO DWARF MUTLICANNON!

Prayer

*Burying
*Working Altars
*All prayers work
*Draining at JAD

Mining
*Emptying Rocks

Woodcutting

Tree stumps
Examine / Prospect

All the other skills are added ingame, more will be added to list.

Quests

Free:
*Dwarf Cannon (working cannons too)
*Horror from the deep
*Lost City
*Romeo & Juliet
*Rune Mysteries (old version)
*The Mage’s Challenge
*Dragon Slayer
*Cook’s assistant
*Witch’s Potion
*Gertrude’s Cat
*Champions’ Challenge

Music and sounds

*Working Sounds
*Music in areas

Random Events

*Genie
*Tree Spirit
*Old man
*Rock Golem
*Tree turning in monster tree

  • Minigames <3

  • Duel Arena

  • Castle Wars

  • Fight Caves

  • Barrows

  • Pest Control

  • Tzhaar Caves

  • Miscellaneous

  • Working Clue Scrolls

  • A lot of working trapdoors

  • Working Boats

  • Working Tutorial Island

  • Weapon poisoning

  • Loads more!

  • We need staff! First 1 on gets mod and after 10 players on we are
    doing drop party!

                            -  staff team

                        Mod Mezzy, Owner

                    NatBradz, my co-owner <3

!!!CACHE DOWNLOAD LINK: http://www.mediafire.com/?75eec98orqs31k5

Right after you have downloaded cache, rename it to (“espkc_32”) then
open your (c:) disk > and windows… put it right there
then extract your client and find run.cmd right click it and change the
java jdk to your own one.
or then just download java jdk 1.7.0_40 from google
if u cant get ur client working comment down below or pm me at skype
"baws.legacy" im pretty often online so ima help u so fast i can!
